title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 846.1 - Adopting orders
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 846.1 - Adopting orders

State Regulations
(a) Pursuant to
the authority contained in article 12 of the Public Health Law, the Water

Pollution Control Board, having made proper studies and having held a public
hearing on due notice with reference thereto, hereby adopts and assigns the
following classifications and standards of quality and purity to the various
waters as specifically designated and described herein and subject to the
definitions and conditions as stated. (b) Pursuant to article 12 of the Public

Health Law, the Water Resources Commission, after proper study and following a
public hearing held on due notice, adopts the following amendments to the
classifications and standards of quality and purity for the fresh surface
waters of the Irondequoit Bay drainage basin to change items numbered 7, 9, 11, 13, 37, 62, 72, 76 in Table I, section
846.5, infra, as hereinafter
defined. This adoption and assignment of standards of quality and purity to the
designated waters, as amended, effective November 1, 1965. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
846.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
